narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Crystal Lab Works LLC is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Skokie, IL. From 2022-07 through 2023-04, this provider received $192K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Billing stopped in 2023-04, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider's billing is dominated by COVID-19 testing codes. The spike in billing likely reflects pandemic testing demand rather than anomalous behavior.
